title: कोरोना वायरस : चाय की बोतल में थूकते लड़के का पुराना वीडियो संक्रमण फैलाने का बताकर वायरल किया गया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: This is not normally what I’ll share on my page.😥but I am lost for words. I cried all night thinking of who will pick up that bottle. It baffled me to see that some people still don’t realise what the world is going through right now‼️.Please share‼️ this guy must be arrested 😥 pic.twitter.com/JyuUUtGJSL
